name: Intercom
description: Send event data to Intercom on PostHog events.

config.hint: Create an Intercom app, then go to Configure > Authentication.
config.name: Intercom API Key

config.hint: A comma-separated list of PostHog events you want to send to Intercom. By default, if you leave this field empty, all events are sent.
config.name: Triggering events

config.hint: A comma-separated list of email domains to ignore and not send events for in Intercom (e.g. 'posthog.com,dev.posthog.com' ).
config.name: Email domains to skip

config.hint: Send events to api.eu.intercom.com, if you are using Intercom's European Data Hosting
config.name: Send events to European Data Hosting
